content: Chasing waterfalls in the Himalayas! üí¶ Chadwick Falls is a hidden paradise just 3 km from Summer Hill. The monsoon has this beauty roaring! Trekked through misty deodar forests and had the entire place to ourselves. Shimla, you keep surprising me! üå≤ #ChadwickFalls #HiddenShimla #MonsoonMagic
Kufri crowds today were INSANE! üòÖ Two hours in traffic just to reach the pony stand. Visit before 8 AM or shift to Green Valley for the same views minus the chaos. #Kufri #CrowdAlert
Hidden gem alert! üçõ Tiny dhaba near Lakkar Bazaar serving Sidu + Madra for ‚Çπ120. Grandma‚Äôs recipe, crazy good! #ShimlaFood #HiddenGem
Golden hour at The Ridge with Christ Church silhouettes never gets old. Tripods allowed if you arrive before 5 pm. #ShimlaSunset #Photography
Solo morning at Viceregal Lodge üå≤ Quiet lawns, zero crowds, ‚Çπ50 entry. Perfect journaling spot! #SoloTravel #Shimla
Jakhu sunrise trek = natural stair master! Start 5:30 AM, carry monkey-proof bags, skip the ropeway. #JakhuTrek #Adventure
Himachal State Museum = art nerd paradise üé® Miniature paintings, zero noise, ‚Çπ50 ticket. #Culture
Green Valley pit-stop > Kufri madness. Pine carpet as far as you can see and no vendors! #Nature #HiddenGem
Coffee dates at Scandal Point ‚òï Sunset light, street musicians, and colonial balconies. #CoupleTravel
Tara Devi sunrise prayers üôè Wooden temple, pine scent, barely any tourists. 20 min forest walk from parking. #SpiritualShimla
Sunrise surf at Ashwem, sunset vinyl set at Artjuna, midnight bebinca run in Panjim. Rented a Vespa + surf rack. #Goa #ScooterLife
Rohtang sunrise ride! ‚ùÑÔ∏è Took the first convoy, dodged black ice, and hit the snow wall viewpoint before crowds. Rent @enfieldersmanali and carry oxygen cans. #Manali #BikeTrip
Living root bridge hikes hit different! 3500 steps to Nongriat, lime soda reward, turquoise plunge pools as payoff. #Meghalaya #Nature
Sam sand dunes under the Orion belt üåå Camel caravans + dune bashing + rooftop folk gigs. Hire a 4x4 from town, return under the Milky Way. #Jaisalmer
